definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
Nanbu county in Nanchong 南充[Nan2 chong1], Sichuan

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一個小男孩下到馬達加斯加南部的一個藍寶石礦裏。

sentences.english: After the Russo-Japanese War, Japan's occupation of southern Sakhalin in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 日俄戰爭後，日本佔領俄國庫頁島南部。

sentences.english: The southern portion of the country is taken up by the Gobi Desert, while the northern and western portions are mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 該國南部是戈壁大沙漠，北部和西部都是高山。

sentences.english: The Jiegou coalmine is situated at southern Huaibei coalfield, designed capacity is 0.
sentences.chinese: 界溝煤礦位於淮北煤田南部，設計生產能力爲0。

sentences.english: Riverside Hotel at Sea Island in the southern part of Davao, from the international airport two kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 海島水邊飯店位於達沃的南部，離國際機場2公里。

sentences.english: A city of southwest India on the Arabian Sea south-southwest of Bangalore.
sentences.chinese: 哥印拜陀印度南部一城市，在孟加羅爾西南編南。

sentences.english: On May 1, most of the oil slick was southeast of the Mississippi Delta.
sentences.chinese: 5月1日時，大部分浮油位於密西西比三角洲東南部。

sentences.english: My parents used to live in South America and i used to fly there from Europe in the holidays.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母住在美國南部而我常在假期從歐洲飛過去。

sentences.english: Moldova is a landlocked country located in southeastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 摩爾多瓦是一個歐洲東南部的內陸國家。

sentences.english: In the South-East part of the complex there was a wine presser.
sentences.chinese: 遺蹟的西南部是一個葡萄酒加工廠。

sentences.english: This paper studies the morphology of the Tibetan dwellings in the southeast of Ganzi.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究甘孜州東南部地區藏族民居的形態。

sentences.english: A city of southwest Scotland on the Clyde River.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭西南部克萊德河上的一個城市。

sentences.english: There was pressure on the university to disinvest in south africa.
sentences.chinese: 這所大學面臨在南部非洲縮減投資的壓力。

sentences.english: A town on the northern coast of the Isle of Wight off southern England.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭南部威特島北岸的一個城鎮。

sentences.english: The southern San Andreas Fault is considered "most primed to break".
sentences.chinese: 南部的聖安德里亞斯斷層被認爲是“最引突破”。

sentences.english: A city of southwest-central Iran south-southeast of Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 設拉子伊朗中西南部一城市，在德黑蘭西南偏南。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
capital city of an autonomous region
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
